channel.title: Jenkins on Ramblings of a cloud engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Jenkins on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: Jenkins Best Practices Talk
item.description: Hi folks. I wanted to take the time to share with you a talk that I recently did. The slides and the source I used, can be found here: Github. And then, there is also a docker image which contains all the plugins, job configurations and all the practices which I did during the talk. Please feel free to have a go with it. DockerHub - Jenkins Best Practices. For easy access and reading, here are the slides on Slideshare: Jenkins Best Practices Slides.
